Author: usr687
Text: Ginger chews can help! Ginger helps settle your stomach and this has helped me in the past

Author: duskedfur
Text: eat small, calorie-dense meals every couple of hours instead of eating average meals a few times a day! recovery doesn’t mean eating like everyone else or eating like you did before your ED- don’t feel bad that your stomach can’t handle normal meals. your stomach capacity is probably smaller from restriction, so getting your calories from smaller meals more frequently will allow you to maintain without having stomach issues. good luck in your recovery!!
